Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Plus Uptown Hotel in Vancouver (Mount Pleasant), you'll be minutes from Mount St. Joseph's Hospital and close to Granville Island Public Market. This hotel is within close proximity of TELUS World of Science and Plaza of Nations.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 69 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Best Western Plus Uptown Hotel in Vancouver (Mount Pleasant), you'll be minutes from Mount St. Joseph's Hospital and close to Granville Island Public Market. This hotel is within close proximity of TELUS World of Science and Plaza of Nations.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mount St. Joseph's Hospital - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
TELUS World of Science - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Plaza of Nations - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Rogers Arena - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Dr. Sun Yat-Sen Classical Chinese Garden - 2 km / 1.3 mi
BC Place Stadium - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Nat Bailey Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Vancouver Olympic Centre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Rickshaw Theatre - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Vancouver Police Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Vancouver Playhouse - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Queen Elizabeth Theatre - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Vancouver Central Public Library - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Queen Elizabeth Park - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Trout Lake Community Centre - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Plus Uptown Hotel is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Direction to the Property from The east. -  From Highway 1, take Grandview Highway Exit. Grandview  turns into 12th. Make a right turn onto Kingsway. The  BEST WESTERN PLUS Uptown Hotel is 2 blocks down on the  right side. Direction to the Property from The north. -  Cross Lion s Gate Bridge and turn onto Provincial Route  1A East. Take Highway 1A East Ramp. Make a right turn  onto Main, Main becomes Kingsway. The BEST WESTERN  PLUS Uptown Hotel is on the left side. Direction to the Property from The south. -  If coming from the Canada-US Border, follow Highway 99,  which becomes Oak Street. Then follow to Broadway,  turn right and follow to Kingsway, and turn right  again. The BEST WESTERN PLUS Uptown Hotel is 2 blocks  down on the left.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: QUADRUPLE TWO DOUBLE BEDS NON SMOKING

Message.Text: No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
